channel.title: Greifers
channel.description:
Having to register a new forum account doesn't seem to stop/deter them. Suggestions anyone?
I haven't registered a account since this one, so I'm not going to pretend I know the procedure.
Email addresses should be tied to each account and non-reusable. So they have to make a new email address to register again. Do we still have a forum quiz to keep complete idiots out?
Since we don't implement a white-list function (except for TNT) forum registration is out first line of defense against greifers.
